  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: CPU AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 GPU with 4 GB VRAM (GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or better)
